name: The Shadow's Grasp
flavorText: "Fear nothing you can touch. What you can touch, you can destroy." —Demon Hunter Kunai
flavorTextHtml: "Fear nothing you can touch. What you can touch, you can destroy." —Demon Hunter Kunai

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 While equipped with a melee weapon, your damage is increased by 6000%.(4) Set:     
 Shadow Power gains the effect of every rune and lasts forever.(6) Set:     
 Impale deals an additional 75,000% weapon damage to the first enemy hit.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
While equipped with a melee weapon, your damage is increased by 6000%.
(4) Set:
Shadow Power gains the effect of every rune and lasts forever.
(6) Set:
Impale deals an additional 75,000% weapon damage to the first enemy hit.
